Image zoom Getty; Splash; Getty

From red carpets to off-duty street style, Stuart Weitzman is a celebrity favorite when it comes to chic shoes. Not only are the brand’s designs incredibly lust-worthy, but the luxurious fabrics and expertly crafted silhouettes make the label’s shoes just as comfortable as they are timeless. Of course, as a celebrity favorite, the shoes also come with a high price tag, running anywhere from $298 to $2,500 and up. But luckily right now during the Stuart Weitzman Sale, you can score styles loved by celebrities such as Kendall Jenner, Gigi Hadid, Ashley Graham, and more on major markdown (and just in time for the holidays!).

Take this opportunity to score up to 40 percent off of hundreds of styles, including Stuart Weitzman’s iconic over-the-knee boots, “Nudist” sandals, trendy mules, classic pumps, and more. There’s no code needed since all sale prices are already listed, so just add your favorites to your shopping cart and check out — it’s as easy as that. We’d recommend moving fast, particularly on Kendall’s boots, because sizes are already selling out fast.

Scroll down to shop six celebrity-loved Stuart Weitzman styles on sale now.
